entry.title: joshuaalpuerto/mcp-agent: Lightweight, focused utilities to manage connections and execute MCP tools with minimal integration effort. Use it to directly call tools or build simple agents within your current architecture.
entry.content: Lightweight, focused utilities to manage connections and execute MCP tools with minimal integration effort. Use it to directly call tools or build simple agents within your current architecture.

entry.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.
entry.content: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.

entry.title: LaithMahdi/example_hono_drizzle_orm_supabase: This is a sample project demonstrating how to build a RESTful API using Hono (a fast and lightweight web framework) and Supabase (a backend-as-a-service platform). The project uses Drizzle ORM for database interactions and Zod for schema validation.
entry.content: This is a sample project demonstrating how to build a RESTful API using Hono (a fast and lightweight web framework) and Supabase (a backend-as-a-service platform). The project uses Drizzle ORM for database interactions and Zod for schema validation.

entry.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

entry.title: karimz1/imgcompress: a lightweight, Dockerized tool for quick, bulk image optimization—resizing and converting formats (including iPhone HEIC) into high-quality JPEG or PNG. Use it through a modern Web UI for an easy, fast workflow or leverage its CLI for seamless CI/CD integration.

entry.title: Christopher-Totlyakov/OnlineMovieAPI: What we created with Cloudflare Worker is a Serverless Function running on Cloudflare's edge network. It acts as a lightweight API proxy that processes requests from the React app, fetches data from the OMDb API, and returns the response. This approach enhances security by hiding the API key and improves performance.
entry.content: What we created with Cloudflare Worker is a Serverless Function running on Cloudflare's edge network. It acts as a lightweight API proxy that processes requests from the React app, fetches data from the OMDb API, and returns the response. This approach enhances security by hiding the API key and improves performance.

entry.title: ashish707917/Weather1: This project was created to provide an easy and intuitive way to check the weather of any city. By integrating with the OpenWeather API, it delivers up-to-date weather information, including temperature and general weather conditions. The app is lightweight, responsive, and built with modern web technologies.
entry.content: This project was created to provide an easy and intuitive way to check the weather of any city. By integrating with the OpenWeather API, it delivers up-to-date weather information, including temperature and general weather conditions. The app is lightweight, responsive, and built with modern web technologies.
